text: Boris Silovich Brechko (Russian: Борис Силович Бречко; 7 December 1910 – 8 July 1987) was a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxed four where they were eliminated in the semi-final repechage. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Boris Brechko
